Darkfate/Blacknightmare::

Darkfate::

Darkfate recaived Drillbit's comm link "I'm come back to 
BlackFortress"

Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare had a bad feeling and she started to walk in 
Blackfortress's corritors, she arrived where Kitkat2, Darkmouse and 
Drillbit were... When she looked Kitkat's she felt a cold sensation 
in her back and if her mettalic skin would have let it,  it had 
became pale...




--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::DarkMouse::
> She checked her scanners again and frowned. She used her arm to 
clean 
> off the screen. "Man, doesn't anyone clean shop around here?"  She 
> noticed that her first observation was incorrect.  She looked up at 
> KitKat2 and Drillbit. "Eh, hey, lovebirds. OK, I may have made a 
> small mistake in my calculations.  It seams there's only one bot at 
> the CF. Sorry  I broke you two up from getting all," she stuck out 
> her tongue and made a face. " mushy and stuff. Go on and get out of 
> here. You two make me ill with all that  Oh, I love you stuff."  
She 
> turned her back to them and went on scanning the area. 
> 
> 
> ::KitKat2::
> She smirked at DarkMouse. "You know, for all the energon on this 
> planet, I'd love to know how you seem to know so much about what 
goes 
> on inside a base."
> 
> DarkMouse::
> She turned to KitKat2 and frowned. "Well, I'm a rodent. I have ears 
> you know. Big ones. Now go and have fun you guys."  She stood up 
and 
> headed for the door. "Ick, lovey dovey stuff. I need some air."  
She 
> left the station and headed to the hatch.  She walked outside, but 
> only a few feet from the door.  She looked up at the sky. "Eh, some 
> bots have all the luck in life." 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > Err... There's only one Pred at the Maximal base, and he's not 
even 
> > attacking, he's talking.
> > 
> > ::Killfest/Incarcinator/Autofire/Scyther::
> > 
> > Killfest watches Incarcinator fly in and land.
> > 
> > "I'll contact you when I get back to base, Motormaster," he says, 
> > grabbing onto Incarcinator as the bot lifts off again. "Hopefully 
> > you'll still be in one piece."
> > 
> > Incarcinator turns, flying off at full speed toward the 
> > Blackfortress. Killfest opens a comm channel to DrillBit. "I'll 
be 
> > right there, DrillBit. We'll review the situation once I arrive."
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Autofire watches two bots fly off, keeping an eye on the brewing 
> > fight between Motormaster and Megatron. If Megatron was going to 
> show 
> > serious signs of losing, Autofire would probably have to 
intervene.
> > ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> > Scyther arrives at the Blackfortress, waiting for them to open up 
> so 
> > that he could get in.
> > 
> > 
> >
